basic.description: This course is an advanced study in costume patterning for theatre, with an emphasis on draping and/or drafting historically based garments for women and men. Projects include period garment research and measuring, sizing and fitting techniques to accommodate actual performers' measurements as well as stage movement requirements.
basic.subject: TPA
basic.title: Advanced Costume Draping and Fitting

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: TPA 4239 and THE 4260 or instructor permission.
